summary: I PURCHASED A 2007 M35X SEDAN IN FEBRUARY 2014. I DISCOVERED TODAY JUNE 2, 2014, THAT I HAVE AN ISSUE WITH MY DRIVERS' SEAT. IT LEANS INWARD TOWARD THE CENTER CONSOLE, AND APPARENTLY THIS IS A RECURRING ISSUE WITH THIS YEAR AND MODEL. IT IS A SAFETY ISSUE, AND I AM REQUESTING FEEDBACK FROM NHTSA.GOV ON THIS PARTICULAR PROBLEM. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THERE IS A RECALL FOR THIS YEAR AND MODEL, OR WHAT IF ANYTHING IS BEING DONE TO RESOLVE THE ISSUE.  *TR
